definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[מָֽעֲדוּ]] 2Sa 22:37 = Ps 18:37; Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּמְעַד]] Ps 37:31; [[אֶמְעָָד]] Ps 26:1; Pt. pl. cstr. [[מוֹעֲדֵי]] Job 12:5; —slip, subj. feet, (fig.) 2Sa 22:37 = Ps 18:37, Job 12:5; subj. [[אֲשֻׁרָיו]] Ps 37:31; cf. Ps 26:1.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass.,—cf. Ba: NB 273;—but pass. not needed here, read perh. ´[[מוֹ]]

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. act. v. Schwally:ZAW x, 1890, 176);—´[[רֶגֶל מ]] Pr 25:19 (sim. of untrustworthiness).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהִמְעַדְתָּ֫]] (so rd. for HCT [[והעמדת]], cf. Sm Co Da Berthol) Ez Eze 29:7; cause to shake obj. [[כָּל־מָתְנַיִם]], i.e. make them totter; cf. Imv. [[הַמְעַָד]] (obj. id.) Ps 69:24.
